name: Tesla Force
description:
The cosmic horrors are awakening. It's time to call upon the heroes of science and eldritch knowledge to defend mankind from an assault from the outer reaches of reality!
Endlessly replayable rogue-lite
Randomly generated levels
Wild array of devastating weapons
Intense top-down shooting action
Large selection of perks to customize your hero
Over a dozen unique abominations to destroy
Play as Tesla, Curie, Lovecraft or Shelley!
UNBOUNDED HEROES

Choose from four brilliant heroes of esoteric knowledge: Tesla, Lovecraft, Curie or Shelley!
TECHNOLOGY UNLEASHED

Utilize an array of scientific weapons, gadgets, perks, and powerups to help mankind to victory over the cosmic horrors.
INFINITE LEVELS

Play again and again: Procedurally generated levels offer endless fresh gameplay. No two runs are ever the same!
LIMITLESS WORDLS

Choose your own path through the corrupted lands, and bear the responsibilities of your choices. The world is procedurally generated offering a unique adventure each and every time!
